content: is a question of type choice with no answeroptions acceptable? How should that be behaving / shown to the user?

Maybe the opposite of rule que-5 is missing? If question is of type choice then either answerOptions or answerValueset has to be non-empty? Otherwise users would be forced to always respond with an empty answer?
It should have answerOptions, answerValueSet or an extension that serves to fill the same purpose.
